verses.roman:
unmāda-daśāya prabhura sthira nahe mana
yei kare, yei bole saba,--unmāda-lakṣaṇa

synonyms: unmāda-daśāya—in such a state of madness; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sthira nahe mana—the mind is not steady; yei kare—whatever He does; yei bole—whatever He says; saba—all; unmāda-lakṣaṇa—simply symptoms of madness.
translation: In this state of madness, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's mind was unsteady. Whatever He said or did was all symptomatic of madness.
